 2022-11452022-10-20AAFC,  CFIA,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations (Hatchery)
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS (HATCHERY) in order to (1) consolidate requirements found in three existing regulations into one regulation with respect to hatcheries; (2) incorporate by reference two documents relating to the care and handling of poultry and the environmental sampling and testing frequencies and standards for hatcheries and supply flocks; and (3) introduce a modernized inspection process through a preventive control plan.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0220 Publication Date: 2022-11-09
AttachmentsAttachment
